title: Appointment setter
job_overview:
Working Conditions: Monday to Saturday 8am-11am AEST. Fully Remote.

Compensation:Upgrade to see actual infoPHP

Experience: 2 years+

About Us:

We are a marketing agency that primarily runs ads for car detailers in the Australia. We are currently looking to add another person to the team as we are rapidly growing. Here are some information about the role:

Responsibilities:

- Qualify inbound leads that come through from our ads
- Schedule video sales call appointment
- Follow up with leads.

What You Need:

- Fluent English – Professional, clear, and easy to understand. DO NOT APPLY IF YOUR ENGLISH IS NOT IMPECCABLE.
- Strong internet connection & quiet workspace – No background noise or dropped calls.
- Confident & engaging – You can keep conversations flowing and handle objections.
- Organized & detail-oriented – You stay on top of follow-ups and track progress.

To apply
Send an email to Upgrade to see actual info your resume and confirm you are available to work Monday to Saturday 10am-1pm AEST

Please also submit a recording of yourself introducing why you are the right fit for the role. You can use this website to quickly record yourself and share the link to the recording: Upgrade to see actual info/
